Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.rules.conditions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICondition
    All conditions should implement this interface.
    IReplyFactory
    Interface for the ReplyFactory to generate possible replies to be send to the client
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConditionEvaluate
    Condition that is true when an expression evaluates true against the given message.
    ConditionFieldsPresent
    A condition that is satisfied if any of a list of tags is present in a message
    ConditionFieldsUnique
    Stores the fields specified by 'tags' and is satisfied if the values of the specified tags are unique within those that have already been stored.
    ConditionMatchAny
    Checks if a any of a list of tags has any of a list of values.
    ConditionMatchMsgType
    Condition that is true when a message matches any of a list of message types
    ConditionStaleTime
    Condition that is true if a given message is stale.
    ConditionTimeInterval
    This condition for targeting messages that arrive over the specified time in a given timezone.
    ConditionValidChar  
    ConditionValidFIX  
    ConditionValidInt
    Asserts that a message has valid ints in a valid range for a set of tags.
    ConditionValidTypeBase
    Base class for conditions that validate a field is of a certain type.
    ConditionValidUTCTimeStamp  
    NilCondition
    Test condition.
